modName: Joke MOD - The Seven Skeleton Warriors
summary: This is a joke MOD of \"Jason and the Argonauts (1963)\".
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Joke MOD - The Seven Skeleton Warriors (ver 1.0)
----------------

This is a joke MOD of \"Jason and the Argonauts (1963)\".

[b]It is very dangerous if you approach them. 
They are stronger than a dragon. [/b]


Joke MOD - Silent Running
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16027
Joke MOD - UFO v1.1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15816
Joke MOD - Monolith v1.1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15875
Joke MOD - Killer Tomato
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16169
Joke MOD - The Time Machine v1.1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16500
Joke MOD - Robby the Robot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16902
Joke MOD - The Thing
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17436


---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.5.24.0


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and overwrite Skyrim Data folder. Or drop the esp into your Skyrim Data directory.


---
Ver 1.0 : First MOD

Lv 100 Skeleton x1 (If he is killed, one of Daedric Armor will be obtained.)
Lv  70 Skeleton x2
Lv  50 Skeleton x4


---
Enjoy!

by hdela
